titleStmt.title: Catalogus librorum ex bibliotheca nobilis cujusdam Angli [i.e. Baron Brooke] qui ante paucos annos in humanis esse desiit accesserunt libri eximii theologi D. Gabrielis Sangar, adjectis theologi alterius magni, dum vixt, nominis libris selectioribus : quorum omnium auctio habebitur Londini 2 ̊die Decembris proxime sequenti 1678 ... / per Nathanielem Ranew, bibliopolam.
titleStmt.author: Brooke, Robert Greville, Baron, d. 1676.
Sangar, Gabriel, d. 1678.
Ranew, Nathaniel, fl. 1663-1694.

notesStmt.note: Auction catalog of the libraries of Baron Brooke and G. Sangar. Cf. Plomer, H.R. Dict. of the printers and booksellers who were at work in Engl., Scot., and Irel. from 1668 to 1725, 1922.
Item at 226:12 identified as Wing S681 (number cancelled).
Reproduction of original in British Library.
